translation.en: [Billy] Aren't you a little old to be playing with dolls, Michael?
Is my kid gonna love this thing, or what?
Yeah, he is pretty cute, isn't he? [chuckles]
Do you know what day it is?
It was exactly ten years ago till I first came to America.
I'll tell you what. Ten years deserves a celebration.
How about I take you out for a drink after work? Come on.
I can't be too late, I'm meeting a girl at nine.
She wants to help me celebrate, too.
[Michael] If you could party after the graveyard shift.
You got a lot of stamina.
Look like the fucking Indians got another one.
We better check it out, Billy.
Stripped truck, Sector H, right off Longfellow Avenue.
We'll get right back to you.
Take anything you want, just don't shoot me.
You fellas got one hell of a friendly city here,
Just stopped for a red light and boom.
You stopped at a red light in the South Bronx
You're not taking that in, are you?
Can't leave it in the car, someone will steal it.
Don't give me a hard time. Get in there.
Come on, let's go! Let's do it!
Okay, I'm going to kick some fucking ass!
Another round for my two friends.
All right, big man. Close that door!
-[man #1] Michael, get the back door! -[Michael] Okay!
All right, everybody over here. Get over to that jukebox!
[man #1] All right. I wanna see rings, watches, wallets.
Hey, that means you, too, bozo! Let's go!
[man #1] Come on! I said right now!
Hey, open that register real quick.
-Before I blow your fucking head off! -[growling]
-[bartender] Take it easy. I'll open it. -Hey, bozo.
Come on, boy. You're coming with me.
I'll be out in a minute.
Oh, man. You shouldn't have done that.
[man #2] Hey, get off my car, you scumbag!
You got five seconds to get off that fucking boat.
Get the hell out of here, what are you doing?
-Where's the boat? -Manhattan Express, right over there.
Get the hell out of that thing.
The Harbor Police will get him.
Damn! Fucking Chinaman don't give up!
Aviation 0-5-Zebra. Officer 1412 in pursuit of a suspect.
I'm in the blue-white speedboat below you. Can you come up over me?
[pilot] Roger, 1412. New York control, this is 0-5-Zebra in pursuit.
We're turning south at the Brooklyn Bridge,
Come in closer and drop me a line.
On the count of three, pull me up as fast as you can.
You deliberately disobeyed a direct order!
That's no excuse for blowing up half the goddamn harbor!
I don't like it any more than you do when a cop gets killed.
But we're not in the revenge business.
The Mayor's been up the commissioner's ass over this one, Wong.
And if he can't get it, he'll take mine!
and let the Harbor Police pick that guy up.
But, no, gotta be a big hero.
Maybe next time you'll think twice
before you pull one of your hot dog stunts.
I'm supposed to blend in with the crowd.
I heard about your fireworks display in the harbor.
You always did have a flair for the dramatic, Billy boy.
How did you get this shit detail?
Some punk pulled a knife on me so I kicked his fucking teeth in.
All the way to the commissioner's office.
You know, if somebody dropped a bomb in here,
they'd wipe out half the junior diplomats in New York.
-Terrific, I'm glad you made it. -[Danny] That's Laura Shapiro.
-[Laura] It's lovely to see you. -Oh, I'd like to work undercover with her.
You're not so bad, but, uh, that friend of yours,
he sticks out like a sore thumb.
Look, uh, you guys allowed to drink? Can I get you a beer or something?
If you wait until I go off duty, I'll buy you a drink.
l just might take you up on that.
Um, excuse me, gentlemen. I have to mingle.
That bum, Shapiro, probably uses his own daughter to launder money.
Listen, you lousy Chink bastard, you keep bugging Mr. Shapiro's daughter,
they'll scrape you off the floor with a putty knife.
His name's Benny Garucci. He's an ex-karate champ.
I would like to bust his fucking head open with a crowbar.
But you're gonna have to hold him. He's a tough son of a bitch.
I wonder why Shapiro needs that kind of muscle here?
Are you kidding? He can afford to have the whole fucking Marine Corps
standing by to protect him if he wanted to.
That fuck owns half of Manhattan, Billy.
l wouldn't mind teaching Garucci a little lesson in manners someday.
Laura Shapiro Marketing is very pleased to introduce to New York City
and his fabulous collection of shimmering cocktail wear.
Can't even keep a girl from being snatched right out from under your goddamn noses.
You could've had your dicks out for all the good it did.
If I take my dick out, I'm gonna use it, Captain.
We couldn't shoot without hitting the girl.
[Commissioner] I think you two men did the right thing.
Well, thank you, sir. Any word from Shapiro?
He has no idea why his daughter was snatched.
We've been monitoring his phone for the past 12 hours.
No ransom demands, no orders, nothing.
A record of all the phone calls made in the last 12 hours by Shapiro's hood,
Six calls all to the same number.
-Hong Kong. -[Captain] How the hell did you get this?
A friend of mine at the phone company.
What the hell does all this got to do with Hong Kong?
There's somebody waiting outside who might just be able to answer that.
Men, this is Bob Cantrell from the Justice Department.
Are these the men who kidnapped Laura Shapiro?
Now, how the fuck should we know? They were wearing masks.
for a powerful Hong Kong crime boss named Harold Ko.
Anybody who knows Hong Kong knows Ko.
Yeah, and a tough one to catch.
Now, we've suspected Shapiro and Ko
of running drugs from Hong Kong to New York for years,
but we've never been able to pin anything on him.
Why the hell would Ko wanna snatch Shapiro's daughter?
We don't know, maybe they've had a falling out of some kind.
there's a good possibility that Laura Shapiro
is now being held in Hong Kong.
Nobody could smuggle a girl into Hong Kong that quickly.
Ko's got most of the island in his back pocket.
Sir, if Laura Shapiro's in Hong Kong we should check it out.
My Chinatown contacts can give me the names
of some good informers over there.
It might be worth our try.
Garoni could come with me. He knows Hong Kong from his Vietnam days.
You're way out of line, Wong.
If you men could find Laura Shapiro and pin it on Ko,
you might just be able to shut off the largest heroin pipeline
to ever come out of the Orient.
Okay, we got nothing to lose.
Why don't you two men go to Hong Kong as special advisors to the local police
and see what you can come up with.
Here's the keys to that jeep you asked for.
-You sure you don't want a driver? -No, we're okay.
Thanks for getting this through customs for us, Inspector.
[inspector] Superintendent Whitehead will meet you tomorrow afternoon at four.
-You got it, Billy? -Oh, yeah, thanks. See you tomorrow.
[Billy] We could stay at a better place, you know?
Memories of magic nights on R & R.
there was nothing around here but a bunch of horny grunts, you know?
And besides, nobody's gonna look for us in a dump like this.
A friend of mine in Chinatown gave this to me.
It's sort of a calling card.
Looks like a bunch of shit to me.
The idea that anyone could smuggle a girl into Hong Kong
without my office knowing about it is simply impossible.
Now, listen to me, you two.
I spoke to your captain and he told me about your Dodge City tactics.
We don't appreciate people like you in Hong Kong.
l want you to assure me that you'll behave with the utmost discretion.
Discretion is my middle name, sir.
Gentlemen, you must forgive the superintendent.
He's been trying to nab Ko for years.
Considers it a personal mission in life.
I think he's worried you will succeed where he has failed all these years.
Don't worry about it, Inspector. I'm used to pissing off superiors.
We ran down the phone number you gave us.
That's where Benny Garucci called from New York.
They, uh, don't necessarily specialize in giving massages,
if you know what l mean.
You bet your ass I do.
Let's check this place out. Maybe we can shake Ko's tree a little.
One of the reasons Ko has managed to stay out of prison for so long
is he doesn't mind killing anyone who threatens him.
If he thinks you're getting too close to finding Laura Shapiro,
your names will be on the lips of every assassin in Hong Kong.
It's a friendly little town you got here, Inspector.
[Danny] This is my favorite part of town, Billy.
We're supposed to be working here.
You know what they say, "All work, no play."
Play around here can get us killed.
At least you'd die with a smile on your face.
-[woman] 105 dollars, please. -Thank you. Please come again next time.
We're just a couple of poor lost souls from New York.
A good friend of ours recommended this place very highly.
We have many friends in New York.
Maybe you remember our friend. His name's Benny Garucci.
Yeah, Benny Garucci. Benny Garucci, he really loves this place.
He talks about it all the time.
So sorry, we... we have so many friends. I can't remember them all.
But I'm sure we can make your visit here very exciting.
[Danny] Don't worry, Billy boy. l wouldn't miss this for the world.
Billy, don't let this guy sneak up on me.
[Danny] My goodness gracious. What do we got here?
Whichever one you want is yours, Billy, huh?
-[Billy] Okay, hello. -You made the wrong choice.
That's... I'm in love, this is mine.
I'm your friend, you gotta take care of your friends, don't you?
Go ahead, make the phone call.
l remember these holes when they were a little smaller, you know?
You remind me of someone I knew in Saigon.
She really knows a way to a man's heart.
[Danny] When did you grow a beard?
Oh, shit, what the fuck is going on here, huh?
Dress them and take them to my office.
l wanna talk to them before we kill them.
A guy can't take a bath in peace?
-Hey, wait a minute. -l think you know why he sent us.
Oh, sure, he's very angry at you people, very angry.
Don't say anything! These men are New York cop.
l am not a cop, I'm a tourist.
-Maybe he's a cop. You a cop? -[Billy] Do I look like a cop?
He doesn't look like a cop.
Tell Harold Ko we're in town.
It's never wise to make threats, my young friend.
Well, you're calling the shots, Billy. What do we do next, huh?
What is it with this coin?
[Billy] Tomorrow we're going to cash this in.
If we use it right, it may tell us everything we want to know about Mr. Ko.
[Danny] This Lee Hing, is he an informer?
He's retired, but he's still tapped into the whole Hong Kong underworld.
[Danny] Well, what makes you think he'll help us?
He may not, but do you have anything better to do today?
Well, as a matter of fact, l could probably think of something.
It's swollen, l think something bit me.
You better watch out for Hong Kong mosquito wearing high heels.
But I don't remember the rest of this new shit.
It all looks kind of different to me, Billy.
[Danny] Looks like our friend's doing okay.
I bring you greetings from a friend in New York.
Tin Ho is a very old and honorable friend.
-Now, Mr. Hing, look, we've just come-- -You are police officers from New York.
You have come here looking for a girl who was kidnapped by Ko.
Gentlemen, there are no secrets in Hong Kong.
Come, sit and have some tea with me.
It's the least I can do.
Seeing as how you have come all the way to see me for nothing.
Soo Ling, ch for our guests.
Why is our trip for nothing?
I've got a charter in a few hours. Can I hit you for some supplies?
Hey, how are you doing there, buddy? I got something for you, look at this.
Straight from the mainland. There you go.
If you know anything about where Ko is keeping this girl,
But a man like you must maintain his contacts.
Could you have them find out for us?
Gentlemen, dealing in information like that is extremely dangerous.
Especially, when it involves people like Harold Ko.
Listen, if there's something you're not telling us, we can take you in
and let the local cops deal with you.
Are these men bothering you, sir?
These gentlemen are simply tired and frustrated.
They are dangerous, Father. Make them leave before they bring trouble.
Don't look now, but I think they already have.
Damn it, they must have followed us, Billy.
You're gonna take me to Ko right now, asshole.
You see? You see the trouble you cause? Why wouldn't you leave us alone?
Tin Ho has asked a favor of me.
Do you think that's wise, Uncle?
But sometimes honor is not wise.
Can you tell me where Ko's holding Laura Shapiro?
Not yet, but my friends will know.
Do you have a picture of the girl?
Stan will know where to find me.
Well, thanks, we really appreciate it.
[Harorld] I hope we can say I'm a friend.
It's not your money we want, it's your ass.
[Harold] I'm sorry to hear that. Goodbye, Mr. Wong.
Get the window, Billy, I got downstairs.
l spoke to your captain again.
He assured me that a machine gun is most definitely not standard issue
I never go anywhere in Southeast Asia without an Uzi.
Do you know what this is?
This is an initial estimate of the damage you caused.
Look, at least we know we're getting close to Ko.
Otherwise, he wouldn't have tried to wipe us out like that.
Oh, you have evidence that Ko is behind the attack?
Jolly good, let's see it then.
I think it's obvious, don't you?
You want to know what kind of reputation Harold Ko has in Hong Kong?
He spent three million American dollars to purchase that horse.
And he's holding a press conference this afternoon
to announce that all its race winnings will be donated
I've already wired your commissioner to ask him to take you off this case.
If I have to set eyes on you again, there'll be bloody hell to pay!
-Can we go now? -Get the hell out of here!
So, what are we gonna do next, Billy?
Let's hope he comes up with something.
ln the meantime, do you like horses?
Ladies and gentlemen, as you all know, Stolen Fortune,
the most successful horse of all time,
sired only one son before he was killed in a tragic fire.
The son, Breakaway Threat, was the horse they said no one could buy.
It's my pleasure to present my latest acquisition...
Breakaway Threat, to the people of Hong Kong.
[man #6] Mr. Ko, how much money do you think Breakaway Threat
will be able to earn for the Orphan Fund?
[Harold] We hope to donate almost two million dollars
by the end of the next racing season.
Mr. Ko, how soon will Breakaway Threat be able to race?
Breakaway Threat will be running one week from Saturday.
You left your briefcase in our hotel room.
I think you are mistaken, sir.
Well, if this isn't your briefcase,
then this isn't your money either.
[Danny] I don't think this guy Ko likes you, Billy.
[Danny] Are you surprised to see Garucci here?
Not really. Right now, we have more important business to take care of.
I'll go see what Lee Hing's dug up.
[Billy] If your father can help us,
we can shut down one of the worst criminals in the world.
Everything will be fine, you'll see.
Billy, for Christ's sake, keep her back!
You. You're the cause of this.
No, l didn't kill your father.
I hate you! I hate you!
If you hate me, then you must hate Ko.
Help me destroy the man who killed your father.
[Soo Ling] My father told me to help you.
The fortune-teller was a friend of my father's.
If my father found out anything, the fortune-teller will know.
that was taken from New York by Mr. Ko.
Yes, but the war is over.
A man has come across the water to make peace.
My people tell me a pact will be made tomorrow night.
And the girl will be returned.
But you must not look for her.
The I Ching is not good.
l must say a prayer for my father and consult the I Ching.
What do your sticks say? Is the fortune-teller right?
But I never read the answers.
[Harold] l trust you found the girl, well?
Yes, sir, just as you promised.
When Mr. Shapiro refused to pay for my last shipment,
l trust it will never happen again.
It was a simple misunderstanding, sir.
Be assured that Mr. Shapiro remains your faithful friend and partner.
He wishes no ill feeling towards you.
Those two cops from New York,
they're getting too close to our operation.
The girl should be returned to you tonight.
As for those two police officers,
They will be taken care of.
Garucci went to this big container shipyard
before he went to see Ko.
Now, it's my guess he was checking on the girl
before arranging an exchange with the big man.
The fortune-teller said the exchange will be made tonight.
So, we have to break in
and get the girl out before that can happen.
The rumors I hear say the place is Ko's drug factory.
Maybe we should call Whitehead, Billy.
We're not sure it's the drug factory.
We're not sure Laura Shapiro's there.
If we're wrong, Whitehead will ship us home.
l can handle myself in a fight.
[Stan] We know you can, Soo Ling.
But someone has to stay behind just in case we're caught.
Now, if you don't hear from us three hours after we hit the place,
Don't worry, Soo Ling, I'll go with them.
You have experience in this kind of things?
I just happen to have some of my old gear with me.
It might just come in handy.
[Stan] I got that from an Israeli friend of mine.
I'll be a son of a bitch.
I ain't never seen anything like that.
The entrance is about four containers in.
About four containers on top of that
there's an air duct connected to an air conditioner.
I'll be right behind you, Billy boy. You got my back, Jones?
I told you the Japanese make great bulletproof vests.
Come on, move out of this joint, let' s go!
-[gasps] -Am I talking to myself here? Go!
-Come on, let's go! -[Stan] Let's move! Let's go!
-[Laura] The guard has the key. -Give me the key
-or I'll blow your dick off! -Key, key! Come on!
What's the matter, you never seen four naked broads before? Let's go!
-[Danny] Good to see you again, Laura. -Yeah. Hell of a way to get a date.
-What the fuck's going on? -They're gonna blow the lab up.
[Danny] Come on, kid, let's go, we're on a count!
[Stan] This sucker's got keys. Come on, let's roll it.
[Stan] Watch out, man! Hurry it up!
The man asked you a question.
Surely, you know we can make you talk.
l got news for you Ko.
You're finished, you're already dead and you don't know it yet.
If you don't give me Garoni, I'm not releasing Laura Shapiro to anyone.
If you kill Garoni, she disappears.
l had no idea your partner's life meant so much to you.
[Harold] I believe we can do business, Mr. Wong.
Shall we say, in my shipping yard?
Stan will take you to Whitehead.
Look, I don't mind staying in hiding until you can get Garoni back.
Tell him to have as many men as possible at Ko's shipyard at exactly 7:00 a.m.
If he's late, there's gonna be lots of dead bodies to pick up.
You're not going in there alone, are you?
Yeah, this is between me, Benny Garucci, and Harold Ko.
I've lived up to my part of the bargain, Mr. Wong.
Mr. Ko is a very influential man in Hong Kong.
Oh, yes, but a well-paid one.
Well, it seems that this affair will come to a happy ending after all.
There only remains one last piece of entertainment.
Soo Ling, you help Laura, I'll take care of Garoni.
[Harold] Start the engine. Start the engine.
Give it to me, come on.
[mayor] In recognition of service above and beyond the call of duty,
which resulted in the forfeiture of over 2,000 pounds of illicit drugs
en route from Hong Kong to New York,
the Police Department of the City of New York
is proud to bestow it's departmental Medal of Honor
["One Up For The Good Guys" playing]
A knock of your a duke of mine
I'll be damned If it won't bring 'em down
When we tear up the town
Trouble on the left Trouble on the right
You got your back to the wall
If you're looking for a hero now
Look the way you can find one
All you gotta do is count to zero
You'll be standing right behind one
And it's one up for the good guys
Make it one down for the bad
And if there's one thing You don't do to a protector
A swack of your a duke of mine
I'll be damned If it won't bring 'em down
It'll be like in the movies
When we tear up the town
Just like in a movie show
When the bad guys out to get you
All you gotta do is let me know
I'll be there to protect you
And chalk one up for the good guys
Make it one down for the bad
And if there's one thing You do not do to a protector
It'll be like in the movies
When we tear up the town
If you're looking for a hero
And reach out for my hand
And chalk one up for the good guys
And make it one down for the bad
No there is one thing You do not do to a protector
Chalk one up for the good guys
Make it one down for the bad
And if there's one thing You don't do to a protector
Subtitle translation by Su Yee Wong
